extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the NEW NOW! radio app! This app is built for the social mediabutterfly! If you enjoy being a part of anything you will want to check thisapp out!Why should you download this app?- Listen live to Edmonton's most social radio station- Join in the conversation by seeing every tweet, Facebook post, and TEXT!Yes text!- Connect with the entire NOW! family all over the world- Take NOW! radio with you wherever you go- Post audio and pictures and share them with the NOW! family- Make it your social networkFeel free to download it, play with it and have fun with it! Download and enjoy!

reviews.title: Google+ login
reviews.comment: This app needs Google+ login,  hate have my name as User_jhhvke
reviews.author: Todd Moore

reviews.title: A little choppy...
reviews.comment: We should be able to choose which feeds we see (texts, chat, fb, etc). Texts that come in more than one mes. are impossible to read (often interrupted by other messages), and often there is missing texts in the 2+ messages. This makes the whole feed very choppy and confusing sometimes.  Discussions on Facebook can go all day, long after the hosts have finished talking about them, again making the feed confusing and choppy.  Hence allowing us to pick what we want to see could streamline the feed if desired.
reviews.author: Melissa Vasilcin

reviews.title: Review
reviews.comment: If android users could see the pictures would give it 5 stars
reviews.author: Terry Bouten

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love it\'s so awesome I listen to the radio all the time
reviews.author: Michael Keogh
